example: Even if some similar areas are found in animals, the fact is that scientists cannot get apes to produce more than a few crude speech sounds.

definition: Wild; crazy.

definition: A mechanical lifting device, often used for lifting heavy loads for industrial or construction purposes.

example: Vaccinate your pets - dogs , cats , and ferrets .

example: Thus, corals are born from the marriage of algae and shells.

definition: A marine crustacean of the subclass Cirripedia that attaches itself to submerged surfaces such as tidal rocks or the bottoms of ships.

example: By this means each whale can consume up to two tons of crustaceans a day.

definition: Any arthropod of the subphylum Crustacea, including lobsters, crabs, shrimp, barnacles and woodlice.

example: Carreño Busta went on to win the title, defeating Gilles Müller in the final, 6–2, 7–6(7–5).

definition: (animal anatomy) A breathing organ of fish and other aquatic animals.

example: They've been eating off the hoof for so long, they just naturally grew a set of extra long horns, that's all.
example_meaning: Chúng đã ăn hết móng guốc của mình từ lâu nay, chúng chỉ mọc thêm một cặp sừng dài, vậy thôi.
definition: The foot of an animal such as a horse, ox or deer.

definition: Willing to respond to persuasion or suggestions.

definition: A friend, acquaintance, or partner; someone with whom one spends time or keeps company

definition: (of an animal, especially a pet) Tame, naturalized.

example: And that kind of pedigree would cost far more than he could afford.

example: Like we're talking a whole kennel .

lithe; quick and graceful in movement

definition: Any large marine fish of the genus Sphyraenus that have elongated bodies, a projecting lower jaw and displaying prominent fang-shaped teeth.

example: Moose and caribou can be found on the island.
example_meaning: Gỗ và açaí cũng được sản xuất tại đảo.

definition: The larva of a butterfly or moth.

example: Two Chinooks and two Apaches.
example_meaning: 2 Chinook và 2 Apache.
definition: (Canada, physics, meteorology) The name given to the descending, warm, dry wind on the eastern side of the Rocky Mountains. The chinook generally blows from the southwest, but its direction may be modified by topography. When it sets in after a spell of intense cold, the temperature may rise by 20°F to 40°F in 15 minutes due to replacement of a cold air mass with a much warmer air mass in minutes.

example: Let out ten bald eagles that had been raised in the Detroit Zoo into the wild.
example_meaning: Thả 10 chú đại bàng đầu trắng từng được nuôi dưỡng ở vườn Detroilt về với thiên nhiên.
definition: A species of eagle native to North America and notable for the white plumage on its head.

example: If he was a healthy weasel, the chicken didn't get a chance to say anything.

definition: (countable) A domestic fowl,Gallus gallus, especially when young

example: No difference to you, my dove of Canaan.
example_meaning: Không khác với nàng, con bồ câu Canaan của ta.

definition: Any of various small falcons of the genus Falco that hover while hunting.
